hero.title:
Your travel memories
become someone's next journey.
hero.subtitle:
Simply upload your photos,
and your travel moments will quietly align.

softCta.text:
Why not preserve
your journey here too?

login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Log in to your account to continue your journey

register.title: Start your journey
register.subtitle: Create an account to record your travels
register.name: Name

mylogue.title: MyLogue
mylogue.noTripsSubtitle: Upload photos to create your travel memories
mylogue.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this trip?

import.title: Upload Photos
import.subtitle: Select your travel memories
import.hint: Supports JPEG, PNG, HEIC formats (up to 50 photos)
import.heicWarning: ⚠ Location data may not be available for HEIC format photos

review.title: Review Your Journey
review.description:
Review photos grouped by time of day
and generate your travel record

analyzing_time.title: Tracing the moments
analyzing_time.subtitle: Finding the rhythm of the day

detecting_places.title: Finding where you walked
detecting_places.subtitle: Your journey is appearing on the map

composing_story.title: Bringing the journey together
composing_story.subtitle: Your travel log is about to emerge

tags.title: Choose the Essence of This Trip
tags.subtitle:
Select 3 tags from the 5 detected
that resonate with your experience

title.title: Choose Your Title
title.subtitle:
Select from 3 options,
or tap to edit

done.title: Trip Record Complete!
done.subtitle: A beautiful travel record has been created from {photoCount} photos
done.warnings: ⚠ Location data could not be obtained for some photos

errors.heicGps: ⚠ Could not obtain location data from HEIC format photos
errors.timeout: Processing timed out. Please try again
